title: Man's Shirt (Poncho)
description: top part is hand-sewn; 6\" horizontal bands with faced neck opening; sleeve part is 14\" wider than lower part; lower part has 5\" hand-sewn vertical bands; tan fabric sewn together and then dyed in dark brown spatter pattern; open 5\" seam (with lining) makes pocket at top of PR elbow; PR reverse has sewn patch with \"S85-72A, (FULANI)\"
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
